item.title: Photos and short video for product - Upwork
item.description:
Photos of my socks for Amazon Page
Video of me using the socks
Professional editing both pictures and video

Would like to visit park nearby to have nature shots
Requisites:
1. Must have manaquen for the socks to have staging pics
2. Video with white screen/green screen background to showcase the socks on
3. Editing of picture and video to ensure pictures are sharp and professional.

If you do not have experience with product /marketing pictures, please do not apply.

For example, see any hiking socks posting for amazon such as

https://tinyurl.com/b7hp3ykv

item.title: PRODUCT VIDEO: For Reed Diffusers - Upwork
item.description:
Make two product videos for our new product of Reed Diffusers. Similar to the video attached for our other product. Video is needed for this product: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0D8CVPY31?ref=myi_title_dp&th=1

ONE FACT BASED VIDEO WITH THE CONTENTS AND QUICK FACTS ABOUT THE PRODUCT, ANOTHER MORE STAGED VIDEO FOCUSED ON THE BEAUTY OF THE PRODUCT AND THE SCENT.

item.title: Product video- Footage Only - Upwork
item.description:
Hi, there!

We are an advertising agency from China. We have many shooting orders from our clients. Most of the videos will be used on the Amazon product page. If you have an interest in making videos and are good at it, please be free to let me know!

Requirement:
1. Create footage for our client's product
2. Use a professional camera to make videos.
3. Know how to make a great video
4. Need model in the video, no gender limit
5. Love to communicate and finish work effectively

Note:
We will provide the script, you don't need to edit the videos, just follow the script to finish the footage, then we will edit by ourselves

If you have interest, please let me know. And we also have many products that need to film videos, not just this one, if you would like to join us, you can send me a video you have done before, so I can know if you are the one we are looking for. If we have a good start, we can build a long-term cooperation

Budget: $100
Posted On: July 01, 2024 14:51 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Video Production
Skills: Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Podcast Video/Audio Editor & Marketer for Mental Health Practice - Upwork
item.description:
Podcast Video/Audio Editor & Marketer for Mental Health Practice

Expert in Podcasts? Video/ Audio Editing? Want to help others?

Holistic Consultation, a group mental health private practice located in Columbus, Ohio is looking for a short-term expert to help edit and market our upcoming podcast, “Let’s Unpack That”.

Candidate must be independent, driven, collaborative, and enhance our dedicated, connected, and positive minded staff.

Qualifications and Skills:
• Several years’ experience working with podcasts, specifically video editing, audio editing, podcast marketing, shorts/reels, podcast into, outro and trailers.
• Strong organization, detail orientation and communication skills
• Proficient with technology and ability to learn new systems as needed
• Proven reliability, adaptability and professionalism
• Able to work independently on tasks assigned
• Prior experience in a mental health environment a plus

This position reports to the Executive Director is available either fully remote or at our Columbus, OH based office. Candidate will be contractor status.


Hourly Range: $20.00-$40.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 14:36 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Social Media Video, Podcast Editing, Podcast Marketing, Podcast Advertising, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Podcast
Skills: Audio Editing, Social Media Video, Podcast Editing, Podcast Marketing, Podcast Advertising, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Podcast
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Grab Clips From A Popular Gaming Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there! I'm a popular video creator on YouTube with 1,800,000 subscribers. My content revolves around the well-known game "Minecraft".

I'm looking for an editor who wants experience with working with a big creator. The tasks for this job are simple: provide me with content for IG Reels + TikTok by grabbing clips from my latest YouTube videos. You will also be in charge of uploading them on those 2 mentioned social media accounts.

I’m looking for around 3-5 clips uploaded per week (so I can post each day). And I will pay you $50 per week!

Simple job for some extra money, and the work itself is quite fun! All you have to do is watch my Minecraft videos and collect clips of the funny or cool moments! You can easily get an entire week's worth of content in 1-2 hours maximum.

***PLEASE HAVE AN UNDERSTANDING OF THE GAME*** If you don't watch/play Minecraft, it might be hard to identify what is worth clipping!

That being said, I hope we can work together! Excited to meet you!

Budget: $50
Posted On: July 01, 2024 14:23 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Audio Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Audio Editing, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Local Photographer/Videographer for Digital Content - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for local talent ASAP to produce photo/video content (website, ads, social media) to promote my agency and podcast. The projects, in priority order below, could easily become a longer-term partnership with the potential to consider additional social media management projects.

Must Haves:
*Local candidates in the DC, MD, VA area (shooting will take place in my home in Sterling, VA)
*Equipment: Must be provided by the photographer/videographer (high-resolution images, 4K video, special lighting, etc.).
*Skilled in photography, videography, direction & editing
*Experience creating content for YouTube, TikTok, and Instagram
*Knowledge of popular video trends
Preferable:
*Able to start this Weds, July 3rd
*Creative Strategy
*Content/Digital Media creation
*Social Media Management

Digital Content (immediate needs):
*Headshots
*Candid/Lifestyle
*Interior design
Videos (including editing):
*advertisement & promo
*product demo
*long-form YouTube
*short-form for TikTok/Instagram

Please provide a portfolio or examples and reviews of your previous work, especially any similar projects. Specify your availability over the next 2 weeks and whether you prefer an hourly rate or a fixed price.

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: July 01, 2024 14:19 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Photography, Videography, Video Editing, Photo Editing, Video Production
Skills: Photography, Videography, Video Editing, Photo Editing, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
